rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious entrance leading to the living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall. Adheres to Vastu principles by facing east.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light and ventilation. Facing north as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Spacious dining area adjacent to the kitchen. Open plan layout with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Family Room/Study
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room for relaxation or study. Large windows on one side provide abundant light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with east-facing windows as per Vastu for positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ample space and an attached en-suite bathroom. West-facing windows for tranquility.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for children or family members with east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with north-facing windows to maintain a calm environment.

rooms.name: Dressing Area
rooms.description: Shared dressing area for the family with adequate space and natural light.

openings.description: Double door entrance ensuring security and aesthetic appeal.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the kitchen ensuring abundant light and ventilation.
Window with floor-to-ceiling design to complement the dining area's natural lighting.
Large windows on one side for ample light in the multi-purpose family room.
